code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{getAllUsers,deleteUser}from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminUsers=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUsers=async()=>{try{const usersData=await getAllUsers();setUsers(usersData);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching users:",error);}};fetchUsers();},[]);const handleDelete=async userId=>{try{await deleteUser(userId);setUsers(users.filter(user=>user._id!==userId));}catch(error){console.error("Error deleting user:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"User Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white border",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"User ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Role"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:user._id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:user.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:user.role}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(user._id),className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded",children:"Delete"})})]},user._id))})]})]});};export default AdminUsers;
